title: Chuveiro Cromado
description:
* Acabamento **CROMADO**
* Comprimento: 43cm
* Diâmetro: 20 cm (8 polegadas)
* Pressão máx MCA: 40
* Instalação com monocomando de parede ou registros separados (quente e frio)
* Necessário aquecimento central (gás / solar)
en_description:
* Finish: **CHROME**
* Length: 43cm
* Diameter: 20 cm (8 inches)
* Smooth Single handle operation
* Recommended for bathrooms
* Low lead compliant - meeting federal and state regulations for lead content

**Why should you buy BRACCI?**

* Premier finishing product - 5 years warranty worldwide
* Italian Design
* Products choice and installation support by our specialist team
